Author: MhmStephany
Text: I’m actually proud of myself because I only had like 1.5 glasses of wine and ate literally a slice of cucumber, a grape tomato, and two pieces of lettuce before I was like wait this isn’t *f a s t i n g* you dumb bitch and then I went to sleep lmfao

Author: prezentme
Text: lol can sooo relate. I'm trying to break this habit currently....but for a while i would break any fast/severe restriction with alcohol because I just couldn't deal with thinking about what to eat...gave me too much anxiety.  But then would just eat like a ravenous cow once the alcohol hit me. Lose/lose
